text:
Message 1 of 4024
Hi Robert,
Confirming I will have Christmas Eve and you will have Christmas Day this year.
Can you confirm pick up time on Christmas Day?
Regards,
Chirstine
Sent:12/23/2023 at 04:38 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/23/2023 at 06:57 PM)
Subject:Christmas Holidays
Message 2 of 4024
Yes, that is what we said. Let's try 9:00 if that works for pick-up.
Are we going to discuss settings here and expectations? Or did you do all of that? Who else has access to this? We should probably both align on what
you did, agree?
robert
Sent:12/23/2023 at 06:59 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/23/2023 at 08:10 PM)
Subject:Re: Christmas Holidays
Message 3 of 4024
You ignored my question about discussing the settings and how this is used both here and in text. And I don’t know what to expect wrt response
time. I have zero info on this all or the way you set it up. When you want to discuss we can move back to it. Till then, I’m out! Thanks!
Sent:12/23/2023 at 08:23 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/23/2023 at 09:41 PM)
Subject:Done using this
Message 4 of 4024
Please refer to Dr Brown communication guidelines and response timelines and expectations. I did not adjust any settings.
I am not going to revert to a communication method that has proven volatile for you.
If you refuse to use this service, please suggest an alternative. This was the service your lawyer suggested as well and you signed up for in September.
